title: Needs to Be a Pure Solo Queue Normal Option
body:
Just had a 4 man premade ask the other team to report be in group, while they themselves told me to kill myself repeatedly. I'd love to never be queued with anyone except for pure randomers in normals, because I play non-Ranked games to AVOID this bullshit, not to make it FOUR people instead of one or two.

Other games have it, wish League did, too.

replies.body: Just for clarity, it'd be solo queue where ALL TEN PLAYERS are solo queued, and everyone is a stranger. There should be a way to avoid pre-mades like this in normals where I'm only playing to have fun.
You play non-ranked... to avoid playing with 4-man premades? Ranked only lets you duo at most, anymore and you need a full team. o.o

> [{quoted}](name=Zair Umbras,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FcPai1aG,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-30T11:31:25.160+0000)
>
> You play non-ranked... to avoid playing with 4-man premades? Ranked only lets you duo at most, anymore and you need a full team. o.o

I played non-Ranked to avoid toxicity; what ended up happening is, in Ranked, at most 2 allies will team up to flame you. In Normals, it can be my entire team save for myself flaming me.

I did normals because I thought it'd be a relaxing way to play League WITHOUT toxicity. I was ass-reamingly wrong.
hes talking about the flame some people think normals are less toxic then ranked (there not) thou they are pretty easy to stomp

Usually normals are easier since people don't know what they're going to face and going off the wall can get a bit insane. Toxicity usually depends I guess. I know my normals MMR is pretty shit, so I get a lot of noobs where as I get a bit less so in ranked. Back when I did normals often, it was always a fight for who ISN'T support. >>
i find they are easier because the kids there just aren't as good as the ones in ranked and they also dont know how to play and that what there doing is bad and troll

This is literally the worst experience in League. I should have the ability to protect myself from this. Normals are supposed to be fun, relaxing and low-strung. I'd much rather play with complete strangers than to even risk having to endure this again.

Simple answer:  Queue times.

A LOT of people queue into games with 2, 3, 4, man parties.  This would make the queue times go up pretty drastically.

OMG I had the same thing happen to me yesterday. Decided to wait until level six to gank as Rengar, next thing you know I had four premades constantly tell me to kill myself all game. This is the worst situation to be in because if you are losing all the blame goes on you no matter what.

> [{quoted}](name=Troy242621,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FcPai1aG,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-30T04:54:02.841+0000)
>
> Just had a 4 man premade ask the other team to report be in group, while they themselves told me to kill myself repeatedly. I'd love to never be queued with anyone except for pure randomers in normals, because I play non-Ranked games to AVOID this bullshit, not to make it FOUR people instead of one or two.
> 
> Other games have it, wish League did, too.

Been proposed by people for a looong time (since before Season 1). Their reasoning each time has been along the lines of it would increase queue times too much.

May have been relevant 5 years ago but now that theres 27 million people playing I'm pretty sure it would be a reasonable thing to do.
More a problem with report system, not pre-mades

Suddenly nobody can queue up with 3 friends because they will not find anybody willing to put up with their shit xD

I couldn't agree more. But this choice would probably remove any chances of four-man premades to play a game (which isn't necessarily a bad thing as most of them are toxic as hell.)

I had this experience, too. Got reported by 3 premades cause at about 25-30 minutes into the game i was stating "I can only see 2 wards on the map and they are from my upgraded trinket. Can you please ward a bit more cause we can't see the enemies coming from the sides?"

And it was a very polite question imho, no one upgraded their trinket or sightstone... i still got reported for intentional feeding with a 11/4/7 as toplaner.

I would love to have a pure SoloQ without premades or have at least an indicator in Teambuilder and Normals where i can see which people queued up together. This would remove the "we are premade i would like to sup [xy]" and make you maybe think twice for going aggressive vs someone and just mute them alltogether.

After several games this week i am in a state where i don't want to chat anymore in Normals and just keep my mouth shut often which i think is morally questionable when someone is being accused falsely for "feeding, not ganking, not warding, KSing in teamfights, ..."
This means that a mixed SoloQ and PremadeQ will not reward standing in for players who get accused ingame but instead will make me just think "oh good they blame the jungler. At least it's not me"
I'd buy that for a dollar.
This ain't Robocop. Although it'd be pretty damned cool if we had a robocop themed champ... Oh wait{{champion:14}}
